thread.title: Dog Pulls Guy’s Underwear Down As He Attempts To Save The Dog From Frozen Lake
thread.title_full: Dog Pulls Guy’s Underwear Down As He Attempts To Save The Dog From Frozen Lake

author: Robert Anthony
title: Dog Pulls Guy’s Underwear Down As He Attempts To Save The Dog From Frozen Lake
text:
Eventually, Colin reaches his brother’s dog Copper. He never saw it coming, but the sheet of ice over the lake gave way just as he was about to grab Copper. YouTube Now, he’s faced with another rescue mission: stopping the dog from pulling his underwear off as he tries to save him from the frigid lake. YouTube He stands up in an effort to pull them up, but to no avail. YouTube The ice gave way yet again as he fell into the lake once more. YouTube Finally, underwear intact, Colin is able to push through the ice and make it out of the lake with Copper. YouTube Check out the hilarious video below! 
At last, Colin was able to accomplish the task at hand. It wasn’t easy, and he almost flashed his entire family thanks to Copper, but he was able to pull through. Well done! 
Now, someone grant this guy a lifetime supply of Hanes ASAP. How To Workout With Your Dog To view this video please enable JavaScript, and considerupgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video
